posts.post_content:
Hey Gang:

I need 5 slabs that you have busted open.  I am building my n28 display and need the caster and the slab without cracks across the face both front and rear.  I always bust mine from the tops and that part will be hidden by the display and I have no interest in the flips.  I am negotiable and will obviously pay for all shipping.  Email at [url]stevensuckow@hotmail.com[/url].  Thanks.

No help out there?  I know there are folks that bust these babies, c'mon, help me out!


Thanks Joe!
